trans-unit.source: Provides a collection that is used to store descriptions of the messages that make up an operation that belongs to a contract.
A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> is used to describe contracts and their associated operations.

Each contract operation has a corresponding <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> that describes aspects of the operation, such as whether the operation is one-way or request/reply.

Each <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> in turn describes the messages that make up the operation using a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription>.
Finds and returns the first message description in a collection for a message with a specified action.

If you need to find all of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription> objects in the collection that match the specified `action`, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescriptionCollection.FindAll%28System.String%29> method instead.
The action of the message being found.
The first from the collection whose message has the specified action and `null` if no matching action is found.
Finds and returns all of the message descriptions in a collection whose messages have a specified action.

If you need to find the first instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription> in the collection that match the specified `action`, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescriptionCollection.Find%28System.String%29> method instead.
The action of the messages being found.
A that contains the collection message descriptions from the current collection whose messages have the specified action.
If no matching <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription"></xref> objects are found, an empty collection is returned.
